titleStmt.title: A true relation of an apparition expressions and actings of a spirit which infected the house of Andrew Mackie in Ring-Croft of Stocking, in the paroch of Kerrick, in the stewartry of Kirkcudbright, in Scotland / by Mr. Alexander Telfair, minister of that paroch ; and attested by many other persons who were also eye and ear-witnesses.
titleStmt.author: Telfair, Alexander.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Mosman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
